Question: The justices unanimously decided in favor of this person; Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg wrote the majority opinion.
Hints: This person's daughter, Dannielynn Hope Marshall Stern, was born September 7, 2006, at Doctors Hospital in Nassau, Bahamas.
This person claimed J Howard orally promised her half of his estate if she married him.
The request was denied by a judge, who instead ordered this person's body preserved until February 20.
